title: Additional Benefits for IR Prime Members
subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin ultricies leo eget nisi finibus, eleifend consectetur tortor blandit

benefits.title: Get an Edge with IR Prime
benefits.content: Knowledge may be power but what your business needs is actionable insights from domain experts. IR Prime Membership unlocks a treasure trove of business intelligence that help readers get a competitive edge.

benefits.title: Exclusive curated content
benefits.content: In-depth articles written and by a team of journalists with over 25 years of experience writing about the retail business and retail leaders

benefits.title: 50,000+ Articles
benefits.content: From store openings, visual merchandising and marketing to finance and funding, technology and strategy IR Prime will unlock access to over 30,000 articles and other content about every aspect of retail

benefits.title: Focussed Newsletters
benefits.content: From fashion & lifestyle, beauty and wellness to technology, IR Prime will get you focussed retail content on 6 categories and functions of retail delivered to your inbox, every day.

benefits.title: Multimedia content
benefits.content: From explainers and charticles to exclusive video interviews and podcasts with who’s who of the retail ecosystem, IR Prime will open a whole new world of retail insights.

benefits.title: Get Special discounts for all IMAGES Group events
benefits.content: IR Prime members get 10%-20% discounts on tickets to industry-leading events by IMAGES Group including retail’s biggest industry conference Phygital Retail Convention.

benefits.title: 6 Exclusive Newsletters
benefits.content: IR Prime Members get focussed newsletters covering key categories and functions of retail such as Fashion & Lifestyle, Beauty & Wellness, Technology, Food & Beverages delivered to their Inbox every day

benefits.title: Exclusive insights by industry leaders & veterans (collage pic of people featured)
benefits.content: IR Prime Members will get access to a host of actionable insights and ideas by leaders and veterans of Indian retail industry through exclusive articles, interviews and podcasts.
